meanings.sent1: The children's tomfooleries at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: Stop with the tomfooleries and focus on your work.
meanings.sent3: His tomfooleries always bring a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: Her tomfooleries were like a colorful circus performance.
meanings.sent5: The tomfooleries of the puppy brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: I can't believe the tomfooleries he comes up with sometimes.
meanings.sent2: The meeting was disrupted by their tomfooleries.
meanings.sent3: Their tomfooleries may seem silly, but they mean well.
meanings.sent4: The tomfooleries of the clowns entertained the audience.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't help but giggle at the tomfooleries of her friends.
